SEARCH
Package Project

Interface Flat

All Known Implementing Classes:
ThreeRoomFlat, TwoRoomFlat
public interface Flat
Represents a flat in a real estate system, with methods to access the flat type, the total number of units, the selling price, and the number of booked or available units. Also provides functionality for booking a unit and converting the flat type to a string.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    Flat.Type
    Enum representing the possible types of flats.

    Gets the type of the flat (either TWOROOM or THREEROOM).

    Gets the selling price of a single unit of the flat.

    Gets the number of units that have already been booked.

    typeToString()
    Converts the flat type to a string representation (either "2" or "3").
    default String
    typeToString(Flat.Type flatType)
    Converts the given flat type to a string representation (either "2-Room" or "3-Room").

  • Method Details

    • getFlatType

      Flat.Type getFlatType()
      Gets the type of the flat (either TWOROOM or THREEROOM).
      Returns:
      The type of the flat.

    • getTotalUnits

      int getTotalUnits()
      Gets the total number of units available for this flat.
      Returns:
      The total number of units.

    • getSellingPrice

      int getSellingPrice()
      Gets the selling price of a single unit of the flat.
      Returns:
      The selling price of one unit.

    • getUnitsBooked

      int getUnitsBooked()
      Gets the number of units that have already been booked.
      Returns:
      The number of booked units.

    • getAvailableUnits

      int getAvailableUnits()
      Gets the number of available units for the flat.
      Returns:
      The number of available units.

    • bookUnit

      boolean bookUnit()
      Books a unit of the flat. Returns true if the booking was successful, and false if no units are available.
      Returns:
      true if the unit was successfully booked, otherwise false.

    • typeToString

      default String typeToString()
      Converts the flat type to a string representation (either "2" or "3").
      Returns:
      The string representation of the flat type.

    • typeToString

      default String typeToString(Flat.Type flatType)
      Converts the given flat type to a string representation (either "2-Room" or "3-Room").
      Parameters:
      flatType - The type of flat (either TWOROOM or THREEROOM).
      Returns:
      The string representation of the flat type.
